body_html:
@mrry - Thanks. I agree this is very unlikely.

@abhijayghildyal After taking a look at the training program, I'm now wondering if this is something to do with the use of tf.train.replica_device_setter ?

In particular, you are using parameter servers, but when you call this method you do not make any mention of ps_tasks. If you read the documentation you will see that ps_tasks defaults to zero, but you probably need to set it to 1 or pass in your cluster_spec.

I can't immediately think how this would go wrong, but it seems like this is worth fixing before spending time on the other problem.
